Text: I love Gaiman. No pun intended. If you like it, try the books. Buy the books. American Gods, first. Why? Otherwise you won't have read it when the HBO series comes out...

I've always pronounced it "Guy-man," although for all I know it could be "Gay-man" just as easily.  Everything in the sandman continuity is good.  Sandman, Sandman Presents, Hellblazer, Swamp Thing, Lucifer, Sandman Mystery Theatre, etc.  Great stuff.  Actually, Vertigo in general just has good books.
